rules.description: Swap command and control for Remote Desktop
Ctrl+Tab -> Switch tabs in the app
Ctrl + Arrow Keys jump a word
Ctrl + Shift + Arrow Keys jump & select a word
Ctrl + BS/Del Keys delete word backward/forward except Finder
Home jump to line start (except Remote Desktop)
End jump to line end (except Remote Desktop)
Shift Home to select from current position to line start
Shift End to select from current position to line end
Ctrl+Home, Ctrl+Shift+Home => Move cursor to beginning of file with and without selection
Ctrl+End, Ctrl+Shift+End => Move cursor to end of file with and without selection
Use F12 to open Dev Tools Network Tab (Mac + Firefox)
Use F12 to open Dev Tools (all browsers)
Option + Shift to select next input source (except Remote Desktop)
